thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Lolis Alexander
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Lolis Alexander

author: Lolis Alexander
title: Lolis Alexander
text:
I was waiting for my order for 65 days. When I checked your site for complain form, the only I found was something in Chinese.
Please check order AN16L23I5751-CY3LAI . According your mail dispatched with track number
RS317922829CN. If you find were is the item, we will discuss again. In any other case you are thieves.
